'''v0.3.3 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Pocket Edition|Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on August 9, 2012.<ref name="mojang">{{cite|url=http://www.mojang.com/2012/08/minecraft-pocket-edition-update-0-3-3/|archive-url=http://web.archive.org/web/20190824070323/https://www.mojang.com/2012/08/minecraft-pocket-edition-update-0-3-3/|title=Minecraft ''Pocket Edition'' Update 0.3.3|website=mojang.com|date=August 9, 2012}}</ref> It added notable features such as new mobs ([[spider]]s, [[creeper]] and [[skeleton]]s), new items, as well as other changes and fixes.

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Bow
|Flint
}}

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bow JE2 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Bow]]'''
* A ranged weapon that fires [[arrows]].
* Can be crafted with [[sticks]] and [[string]]s.
'''[[File:Flint JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Flint]]'''
* Occasionally drops from [[gravel]].
* Can be used to craft [[arrows]].

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Skeleton JE3 BE1.png|width=57x57]] [[Skeleton]]s'''
* Undead [[mob|hostile mobs]] equipped with a [[bow]].
* Drop 0–2 [[bones]] and 0–2 [[arrows]] when they die.
'''[[File:Spider JE2 BE1.png|width=50x50]] [[Spider]]s'''
* [[mob|Neutral mobs]] that have the ability to climb walls.
* Drop 0–2 [[string]] when they die.
* The eyes of spiders don't glow.
'''[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|width=61x61]] [[Creeper]]'''
* Currently does not spawn naturally.
* [[mob|Hostile mobs]] that silently approach the [[player]] and [[explode]].
* Drop 0–2 [[gunpowder]] when they die.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Lava BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Lava]]'''
* No longer creates fire.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Arrow (item) JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Arrow]]s'''
* Now serves as ammunition for [[bows]].
* Can now be crafted with [[flint]], a [[stick]], and a [[feather]].
'''[[File:Bone JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Bone]]s'''
* Can now be crafted into [[bone meal]].
'''[[File:Bone Meal JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Bone meal]]'''
* Can now be used to grow flowers and roses on grass blocks.
* Can now be used on saplings to make them instantly grow into their respective tree type.
'''[[File:String JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[String]]'''
* Can now be used to craft bows.
'''[[File:Feather JE2 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[Feather]]s'''
* Can now be used to craft arrows.
'''[[File:Wooden Sword JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[File:Wooden Shovel JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[File:Wooden Pickaxe JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] [[File:Wooden Axe JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]] Wooden [[tool]]s'''
* Durability has been increased from 11 uses to 60 uses.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Chicken JE1 BE1.png|width=38x38]] [[Chicken]]s'''
* Now drop 0–2 feathers when they die.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[File:Item.gif|width=32x32]] [[Dropped item]]s'''
* Decay time extended to 5 minutes.

=== Gameplay ===
[[File:Brightness comparison - 0.3.2-0.3.3.gif|thumb|The difference between light levels before and after this update.]]
'''[[Light]]'''
* Increased overall brightness.
'''[[Fall damage]]'''
* A ''bone breaking''{{info needed}} sound is played after falling from large enough heights.
'''[[File:Hotbar (BE).png|width=239x239]] [[Hotbar]]'''
* The minimum number of inventory slots has been increased to 6 for all devices.
'''[[Durability]]'''
* Hitting mobs now counts as 1 use for swords and 2 uses for axes, pickaxes, and shovels.
'''[[Creative inventory]]'''
* Additions:
** [[Bow]]
** [[Clay]]
** [[Snow block]]
** [[Oak sapling]]
** [[Spruce sapling]]
** [[Birch sapling]]

== Fixes ==
'''19 bugs fixed'''

* [[Fire]]'s spreading mechanics have been disabled as a temporary fix for a bug where fire would spread throughout an entire world after a single flammable block had been set aflame by [[lava]].
* The [[furnace]], [[block of iron]], [[lapis lazuli block]], [[block of gold]], and [[block of diamond]] crafting recipes have been corrected.
* Fixed furnace crash bug.
* Sapling/leaves fixes.
* Crafting doors now requires a crafting table.
* [[Torch]]es can now be placed on fences.
* [[Dandelion yellow]] dye no longer appears as an egg in MATTIS or the hotbar.
* A bug where cactus and door placed next to each other would remove the bottom door block (and top one if a 2 level cactus).
* Attempting to mine [[invisible bedrock]] no longer produces breaking particles.
* [[Stairs]] now block light.
* Some sounds that are missing can now be heard: cow hurt sound, the sound when you break glass/ice.
* A bug where [[fence gate]] would not appear in the user’s hand but in the world.
* If the player stands on a slab and creates another one, the player falls through both slabs.
* Swords (and other tools) now take damage from attacking mobs.
* Golden tools are no longer more resistant than wooden tools.
* The rear end texture is upside down on some animals.
* The D-pad on iPad no longer/rarely intersects with the item slots.
* A block's placement rules are no longer ignored if the block is placed on/in water, lava, fire, or snow layers.
* Blocks placed on snow are no longer duplicated in multiplayer.</onlyinclude>
